pages.text: $(item)Trading stations$() are an item that can be placed to trade with other players.

pages.title: Buying
pages.text: You can buy items from the trading stations by using the station with payment item.

pages.title: Selling
pages.text: Setting up your own trading stations is very simple! Just place down a trading station and open it. On the left side you can set the product and the payment. The inventory on the right side will have the products and the payments.
